name: Neo Code Commerce
short_description: Neo Code Commerce is a PHP / MySQL e-commerce shopping cart program. Built on a foundation of an internet pharmacy, it is a powerful online store. It is for selling products with multiple price points online. It is a customizable ecommerce platform.
